item.title: About
item.description: Hello there ! My name is Paul Hautenauve, but I use the name @P0ulp1 online. First of all, why did I created this website ? Well this is like a lot of professionnal CyberSecurity aspirants, I’m gonna document everything I learn, as a way to memorize it better and maybe help other students ! My goal is to get the OSCP, but they are other steps before that. As of today, I have basic knowledge in pentesting.
item.content:
Hello there ! My name is Paul Hautenauve, but I use the name @P0ulp1 online.

First of all, why did I created this website ? Well this is like a lot of professionnal CyberSecurity aspirants, I’m gonna document everything I learn, as a way to memorize it better and maybe help other students !

My goal is to get the OSCP, but they are other steps before that. As of today, I have basic knowledge in pentesting. I trained a bit on Hack The Box, Hack The Box Academy, Try Hack Me, Over The Wire. Im also learning some Python with Udemy 100 Days Of Code Course by Dr.Angela Yu and I’m considering also taking the HTML class by the same teacher but I don’t wanna get too overwhelmed. I already have basic knowledge of HTML/CSS and Python though.

Have a look around, feel free to contact me with the informations below :

Discord : P0ulp1#3304 (Recommended if you want a quick reply)
Email : paul.hautenauve@yahoo.com

Stay safe and focused,
P0ulp1,
